response.original_title: The Big Game XXIX - Bugs Vs Daffy
response.overview: The Big Game XXIX: Bugs Vs. Daffy was a four-hour marathon of Looney Tunes cartoons that aired on Cartoon Network from 6 to 10 PM on 27 January 2001, and again from 1 PM to 5 PM the very next day. It was the fourth and ultimately last installment in the "Big Game" series of marathon specials parodying the Super Bowl.
response.title: The Big Game XXIX - Bugs Vs Daffy
